name: Temple Pop!_OS
description: Pop!_OS theme for Temple University's website. It is pretty dark. Dark is good.
css:
@-moz-document domain("temple.edu") {
.page,
.paragraphs-bundle--tu_pg_accordion .field-tu-accordion-item-heading,
.paragraphs-bundle--tu_pg_accordion .content-accordion.active,
main > .region-content p,
main > .region-content ol,
main > .region-content ul,
main > .region-content .field-type-text-long div,
.cke_editable p,
.cke_editable ol,
.cke_editable ul,
.cke_editable .field-type-text-long div,
.content-stage--with-masthead__boundary,
.zone-user-wrapper,
.not-front .zone-content-wrapper,
.not-front .region-content,
#zone-departments-wrapper,
.front .zone-home-featured-wrapper,
.block-featured-news-item-block,
.block-homepage-news-events,
.block-9473a3a15de8f82baf1ba14547516454,
#zone-home-sub-featured-wrapper,
.front .quicktabs-tabs li.active,
#edit-submit-directory,
#edit-submit-news-page,
#edit-submit-undergraduate-research-projects,
#edit-submit-advising-sheets,
#content-col,
#nav-col,
textarea,
select,
input[type="date"],
input[type="datetime"],
input[type="datetime-local"],
input[type="email"],
input[type="month"],
input[type="number"],
input[type="password"],
input[type="search"],
input[type="tel"],
input[type="text"],
input[type="time"],
input[type="url"],
input[type="week"],
button,
input[type="reset"],
input[type="submit"],
input[type="button"],
button,
.textbox:focus,
input[type="reset"]:hover,
input[type="submit"]:hover,
input[type="button"]:hover,
.mm-panels,
.mm-panels > .mm-panel,
.not-front .columns,
#main-content,
#header,
.lfjsbubble .lfjsbubblecontent,
.lfjsbubble .lfjsbubbletopright,
#content th,
.content,
select,
.section,
.main,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-navigation-wrapper,
.l-content-wrapper,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-introduction .l-region .block,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-main aside .l-region .block,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-preface .l-region .block,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-callout .l-region .block,
header,
#login,
#body,
body,
html,
.price-table,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-navigation-wrapper nav #mobile-menu-form .menu li {
    background: none;
    background-color: #33302f;
    color: #f6f6f6;
    text-shadow: none;
}

#templesearch input[type="text"],
.not-front .region-content,
#block-system-main-menu .content ul.menu li a:hover,
#block-system-main-menu .content ul.menu li a:focus,
#main-menu .content ul.menu li a:hover,
#main-menu .content ul.menu li a:focus,
.front .quicktabs-tabs li,
.region-sidebar-second .menu-name-main-menu,
.region-sidebar-second .block-cst-in-the-media-block-1 .block-inner,
.region-sidebar-second .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility,
.view-advising-call-out-box,
.block-featured-news-item-block,
.block-homepage-news-events,
.block-9473a3a15de8f82baf1ba14547516454,
.pager li a:hover,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li a:hover,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li.last a:hover,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li a:focus,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li.last a:focus,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li.active-trail a,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-introduction .l-region .block .entity-wrapper .content-inner > div:last-child a:hover,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-introduction .l-region .block .entity-wrapper .content-inner > div:last-child a:focus,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-main aside .l-region .block .entity-wrapper .content-inner > div:last-child a:hover,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-main aside .l-region .block .entity-wrapper .content-inner > div:last-child a:focus,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-preface .l-region .block .entity-wrapper .content-inner > div:last-child a:hover,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-preface .l-region .block .entity-wrapper .content-inner > div:last-child a:focus,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-callout .l-region .block .entity-wrapper .content-inner > div:last-child a:hover,
.hooter-theme-design-three .l-callout .l-region .block .entity-wrapper .content-inner > div:last-child a:focus,
#content tr.odd {
    background-color: #413e3c;
    border: solid 1px #413e3c;
}

.site-ddard-www2.page--width-full:not([class*="subdirectory-"]).tu-layout-latest-news-type-multi_even .paragraphs-bundle--tu_pg_latest_news .tu-news-block-grid.-with-featured-item .view-news-block-grid__header::before,
.site-www2.page--width-full:not([class*="subdirectory-"]).tu-layout-latest-news-type-multi_even .paragraphs-bundle--tu_pg_latest_news .tu-news-block-grid.-with-featured-item .view-news-block-grid__header::before,
body.page--width-full .paragraphs-bundle--tu_pg_latest_news .tu-news-block-grid .view-content .views-row,
.paragraphs-bundle--tu_pg_latest_news .tu-news-block-grid .view-content .views-row,
.tu-layout-header-type-legacy #block-superfish-1 .main-menu .menuparent ~ ul,
.tu-layout-header-type-legacy #block-superfish-1 .sf-menu .menuparent ~ ul,
.zone-subfooter-wrapper,
.zone-footer-wrapper,
#region-menu,
.pager {
    background-color: #2b2928;
    border: none;
}

button:focus,
button:active,
input:focus,
input:active,
select:focus,
select:active,
textarea:focus,
textarea:active,
button,
input[type="reset"]:hover,
input[type="submit"]:hover,
input[type="button"]:hover,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li a:hover,
#templesearch input[type="text"],
.not-front .region-content,
#block-system-main-menu .content ul.menu li a:hover,
#block-system-main-menu .content ul.menu li a:focus,
#main-menu .content ul.menu li a:hover,
#main-menu .content ul.menu li a:focus,
.front .quicktabs-tabs li,
.region-sidebar-second .menu-name-main-menu,
.region-sidebar-second .block-cst-in-the-media-block-1 .block-inner,
.region-sidebar-second .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility,
.view-advising-call-out-box,
.block-featured-news-item-block,
.block-homepage-news-events,
.block-9473a3a15de8f82baf1ba14547516454,
.pager li a:hover,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li a:hover,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li.last a:hover,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li a:focus,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li.last a:focus,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li.active-trail a {
    box-shadow: 0 4px #f6a53a;
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 1px 0 0 #f6a53a;
}

.region-sidebar-second-inner .block-views-cst-in-the-media-block-1,
.region-sidebar-second-inner .block-menu-block-1,
.region-sidebar-second-inner .block-menu-block-3,
.region-sidebar-second-inner .block-urp-projects-semester-block-2,
.region-sidebar-second-inner .block-menu-block-4,
.region-sidebar-second-inner .block-advising-call-out-box-block,
#tu-programs-search-options-degree-level input:checked + label,
#tu-programs-search-options-degree-level input:checked ~ label {
    border-bottom: .5em solid #f6a53a;
}

html,
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
.not-front .region-content-inner,
.region-sidebar-second .menu-name-main-menu ul li a,
.region-sidebar-second .menu-block-3 ul li a,
.region-sidebar-second .menu-block-4 ul li a,
.not-front .region-content-inner h2,
.view-news-page .view-grouping-header,
.node-undergraduate-research-program h2.title,
.block-menu-block-2 .menu-name-menu-navigation---utility ul.menu li a,
.pager li.pager-current,
.module-subtitle,
.region-main-column .content ul li::before,
#block-bean-about-temple-university ul li::before,
span,
.tu-programs-search__btn--refine span,
.tu-programs-search__btn--refine:hover span,
.tu-programs-search__btn--refine:focus span,
#edit-combine-wrapper input[type="text"]:placeholder-shown,
main > .region-content ul li,
.cke_editable ul li {
    color: #f6f6f6 !important;
}

.not-front .region-content-inner .title,
a:link,
a:visited,
.menu-block-1 .menu li a.active-trail,
.menu-block-1 .menu li a:active,
.menu-block-3 .menu li a.active-trail,
.menu-block-3 .menu li a:active,
.view-urp-projects-semester .menu-name-main-menu ul.menu a.active,
.menu-block-4 .menu li a.active-trail,
.menu-block-4 .menu li a.active,
button,
input[type="reset"],
input[type="submit"],
input[type="button"],
#tu-programs-search-options-degree-level input:focus + label,
#tu-programs-search-options-degree-level input:focus ~ label,
#tu-programs-search-options-degree-level input:checked + label,
#tu-programs-search-options-degree-level input:checked ~ label,
#tu-programs-search-options-degree-level input:checked:focus + label,
#tu-programs-search-options-degree-level input:checked:focus ~ label {
    color: #e98b3d !important;
}

b,
strong {
    font-weight: normal;
    text-decoration: underline;
}

.paragraphs-bundle--tu_pg_accordion .field-collection-container {
    border: 25px solid #33302f;
}

.entity .entity-bean .bean-tu-cta-block .tu_cta_block .bean-tu-cta-block--color-1274d6 .-width-portal .bean-tu-cta-block--no-image .bean-tu-cta-block--width-portal .-link-count-single {
    background-color: black !important;
}
}
